title: Closed-Form EGN Model with Comprehensive Raman Support
authors:
Yanchao Jiang, Antonino Nespola, Stefano Straullu, Alberto Tanzi,
  Stefano Piciaccia, Fabrizio Forghieri, Dario Pilori, Pierluigi Poggiolini
abstract:
We present a series of experiments testing the accuracy of a new closed-form
multiband EGN model, carried out over a full-Raman 9-span C+L link.
Transmission regimes ranged from linear to strongly non-linear with large ISRS.
We found good correspondence between predicted and measured performance.
subjects: Electrical Engineering and Systems Science/Signal Processing
